news.image_caption: ThreeFold's October 2020 community update is here
news.content:
Itâ€™s the end of October and a lot has gone on this month â€“ an upgrade to testnet, progress on ThreeFold Now, some notable new team members, and more!

Please find a recap of our October activities here.

& have a great weekend! ðŸŽƒ
news.excerpt: Itâ€™s the end of October and a lot has gone on this month â€“ an upgrade to testnet, progress on ThreeFold Now, some notable new team members, and more! Find the link to the full update within!

previous.title: ThreeFold Product Demos Are a Must Watch!
previous.excerpt: Demos of the latest & greatest ThreeFold products & solutions â€“ some of which are available today & some coming soon on testnet.
